sourcesContent:
<template>
  <hr id="rightNavHr" />
  <router-view/>
</template>

<script>
import $ from 'jquery'

$(function(){
  var documentHeight = $("body").height() 
  var clientHeight = $(window).height() 
  $(window).scroll(function (e) {
      var scrollTop = $(window).scrollTop() 
      $("#rightNavHr").css("width",(scrollTop / (documentHeight - clientHeight)) * 100+"vh")
  });
})
    
</script>


<style lang="less">
  #app {
    font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    text-align: center;
    color: #2c3e50;
    overflow-x: hidden;
    overflow-y: hidden;
  }

  #rightNavHr{
    border: 5px solid red;
    position: fixed;
    z-index: 1000;
    width: 0vh;
    right: 0;
    top: -20px;
    transform: rotate(-90deg);
    transform-origin: right;
}
  
</style>
